description: Developed and maintained modular, reusable UI components for key workflows in a B2B SaaS platform
Designed and implemented RESTful APIs using .NET Core and PostgreSQL within a microservices architecture integrated with Kafka for event-driven processing

Built and maintained shared frontend and backend libraries in React and .NET Core, adopted by multiple internal teams and helping reduce code duplication by around 20% while improving maintainability and on boarding speed
Developed the User Interface for a 3D Car Configurator Application using React components,enhancing user interaction.
Designed workflows for UI and 3D Model interactions, improving response times by 30% and  ensuring real-time model updates
Implemented secure user authentication and authorization with JWT, including data hashing for secure storage.
